prompt: Create a professional contact us page with a clean white background and modern design. Include a centered title 'Contact Us' in dark blue (Color(0xFF1565C0)) at the top, followed by a subtitle explaining users can reach out for support. Display three main contact methods in cards: Phone (+1 234 567 8900) with a phone icon, Email (contact@example.com) with an envelope icon, and Address (123 Business St, City, State 12345) with a location icon. Each card should have a light blue background (Color(0xFFF3F9FF)), rounded corners, and subtle shadow. Below the contact methods, add a contact form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message. The form should use outlined text fields with blue borders. Include a blue 'Send Message' button at the bottom. Use proper spacing with EdgeInsets.all(16) for main padding and maintain consistent vertical spacing of 24 pixels between sections.
